Dear Asaam,

 

Apologies for the delay.

 

After reviewing the documents and cross checking with claims sheet it appears the above subject claim is not only late reported but a claim from last year. DOL is 15/08/2023 near a year ago as per the attached AWB and POD.

 

1.	Advise us the above shipment is under which client Chalhoub Group Arabia (CGA) or Radwa Trading Co (RTC);
2.	Please clarify why it is just now being report;
3.	Kindly return the attached claim form duly completed on all aspects;

Best

Dear Asaam,

 

Apologies for the delay.

 

After reviewing the documents and cross checking with claims sheet it appears the above subject claim is not only late reported but a claim from last year. DOL is 15/08/2023 near a year ago as per the attached AWB and POD.

 

1.	Advise us the above shipment is under which client Chalhoub Group Arabia (CGA) or Radwa Trading Co (RTC);
2.	Please clarify why it is just now being report;
3.	Kindly return the attached claim form duly completed on all aspects;
4.	Customs/bayan final declaration;

7.	Declaration month for the above subject claim.

 

Best

Dear Asaam,

 

Apologies for the delay.

 

After reviewing the documents and cross checking with claims sheet it appears the above subject claim is not only late reported but a claim from last year. DOL is 15/08/2023 near a year ago as per the attached AWB and POD.

 

1.	Advise us the above shipment is under which client Chalhoub Group Arabia (CGA) or Radwa Trading Co (RTC);
2.	Please clarify why it is just now being report;
3.	Kindly return the attached claim form duly completed on all aspects;
4.	Customs/bayan final declaration;
5.	Please note there more than 76 invoice submitted to us without being highlighted, we kindly ask you to only provide us with invoices with claimed items;

	1.	Please (stressing) highlight the damaged/claimed items

6.	Photos of the open box(es) showing the shortage/damages;
7.	Declaration month for the above subject claim.

 

Best

 

 



	Bander Mubarak Al Besher

Dear Asaam,

 

Apologies for the delay.

 

After reviewing the documents and cross checking with claims sheet it appears the above subject claim is not only late reported but a claim from last year. DOL is 15/08/2023 near a year ago as per the attached AWB and POD.

 

1.	Advise us the above shipment is under which client Chalhoub Group Arabia (CGA) or Radwa Trading Co (RTC);
2.	Please clarify why it is just now being report;
3.	Kindly return the attached claim form duly completed on all aspects;
4.	Customs/bayan final declaration;
5.	Please note there more than 76 invoice submitted to us without being highlighted, we kindly ask you to only provide us with invoices with claimed items;

	1.	Please (stressing) highlight the damaged/claimed items

6.	Photos of the open box(es) showing the shortage/damages;
7.	Declaration month for the above subject claim.

 

Best
